content.raw: I just noticed that in the vertical layout version, the left side of the spinboxes are not aligned either, so adding the   to each title looks worse than just adding it the the "f". Could you use a gridLayout to give it a cleaner look, fixing both the label getting cut off issue, and the concerns about the spinboxes and units boxes not lining up?
content.html: I just noticed that in the vertical layout version, the left side of the spinboxes are not aligned either, so adding the   to each title looks worse than just adding it the the "f". Could you use a gridLayout to give it a cleaner look, fixing both the label getting cut off issue, and the concerns about the spinboxes and units boxes not lining up?
